net.akami.mask.core

Class MaskSimplifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.akami.mask.core.MaskSimplifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MaskOperator<java.lang.Void>

    public class MaskSimplifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements MaskOperator<java.lang.Void>
    An overlay to the ReducerTree system. It currently uses the ReducerFactory class to compute results. In the future, the ReducerFactory class will be removed and calculations will be performable through this operator only.

    • Method Detail

      • compute

        public void compute(Mask in,
                    Mask out,
                    java.lang.Void e,
                    MaskContext context)
        Description copied from interface: MaskOperator
        Computes a result from the given in parameter, writing the result into the mutable out parameter, using the extra data required. Although some of the operators just need a single input being the in Mask, most of them need extra information that cannot be taken out of the initial Mask, such as which char corresponds to the variable (non-constant) for the derivatives calculator, or which variables should be replaced by which values for the images calculator.
        Specified by:
        compute in interface MaskOperator<java.lang.Void>
        Parameters:
        in - the Mask which will be used as the basis to compute the result
        out - the Mask which will be used as the container for the computed result
        e - potential extra data required by the operator for each calculation
        context - the environment for the calculations. See MaskContext for further information
